text: We should love people and use things rather than love things and use people.
Music .. brings us near to the infinite. Thomas Carlyle
If one way be better than another that you may be sure is nature's way. Aristotle
Most people give the best hours of their lives to their televisions. Robin Sharma
Being poor is a frame of mind. Mike Todd
Man is a universe within himself. Bob Marley
I will love the light for it shows me the way yet I will endure the darkness because it shows me the stars. Og Mandino
I take it that what all men are really after is some form of, perhaps only some formula of, peace. James Conrad
At the centre of your being you have the answer; you know who you are & you know what you want. Lao Tzu
Beauty gets the attention but personality gets the heart.
Being miserable is a habit. Being happy is a habit. The choice is yours. Tom Hopkins
Men marry women & hope they'll never change. Women marry men and hope they'll change. Invariably they are both disappointed. Albert Einstein

Most great people have attained their greatest success just one step beyond their greatest failure. Napoleon Hill
To me, every hour of the day and night is an unspeakably perfect miracle. Walt Whitman
An ICON is a person who firmly believes I CAN.
To the mind that is still, the whole universe surrenders. Lao Tzu
Be yourself. An original is always worth more than a copy.
To see the Divine as something external is to be outside of It; to become It is to be most truly in Beauty. Plotinus
A mind at peace, a mind centered and not focused on harming others, is stronger than any physical force in the universe. Wayne Dyer
Always bear in mind that your own resolution to succeed, is more important than any other one thing. Abraham Lincoln
We can only be said to be alive in those moments when our hearts are conscious of our treasures. Thornton Wilder
Be ashamed to die until you have won some victory for Humanity. Horace Mann
Be thankful for what you have. You have no idea how many people would love to have what you've got.
Awake is our nature. Enlightenment is a steady abidance in that. Neelam
To know what people really think pay regard to what they do rather than what they say. Descartes
“..there is almost no such thing as ready. There is only now. And you may as well do it now.” Hugh Laurie
“It’s a terrible thing.. in life to wait until you’re ready. I have this feeling now that actually no one is ever ready to do anything....”
@AlanWattsDaily: If you don’t listen to your inner voice, you are not listening to your own wisdom and to your own love.
Traditionalists are pessimists about the future and optimists about the past.
Meditation is of the greatest importance. It opens the door to the incalculable, to the measureless. J Krishnamurti
We are so vain that we even care for the opinion of those we don't care for. Marie Von Ebner-Eschenbach
U can clutch the past so tightly to your chest that it leaves ur arms too full to embrace the present. Jan Glidewell
Men are failures not because they are stupid but because they are not sufficiently impassioned. Struther Burt
Man is so made that when anything fires his soul, impossibilities vanish. Jean de La Fontaine
True happiness is not attained through self-gratification but through fidelity to a worthy purpose. Helen Keller
Live out of your imagination, not your history. Stephen R Covey
He who lives in harmony with himself lives in harmony with the universe. Marcus Aurelius
I wish I could show you when you are lonely or in darkness the astonishing light of your own being. Hafiz
Happiness is not of yesterday, happiness is not the product of time, happiness is always in the present; a timeless state. J Krishnamurti
I don't believe in failure. It is not failure if you enjoyed the process. Oprah Winfrey
Helping others is the way we help ourselves. Oprah
Heaven on Earth is a choice you must make, not a place you must find. Wayne Dyer
Love all, trust a few, do wrong to none. William Shakespeare
Logic will get you from A to B. Imagination will take you everywhere. Einstein
Listen to the inward voice and bravely obey that. Do the things at which you are great, not what you were never made for. Emerson
Do you realize that every complaint is an affirmation of something you think you don't want in your life? Louise Hay
Continuous improvement is better than delayed perfection. Mark Twain
Conversation enriches the understanding; but solitude is the school of genius. Edward Gibbon
Love is what's left when you let go of everything you don't need. Erich Schiffmann
Be yourself. Everyone else is taken. Oscar Wilde
How much harder it is to bear ones splendour than ones miseries! Douglas Harding
I read a saying, “You should meditate once a day and if you don't have time, you should meditate twice a day!" Sanjiv Chopra
Do you want to know who you are? Don’t ask. Act! Action will delineate and define you. Thomas Jefferson
I am no lion to overpower my enemies. Winning over myself, if I can; is enough. Rumi
Believe in something big. Your life is worth a noble motive. Walter Anderson
Being empty of oneself is to be full of the intelligence of life which can then come to us without hindrance. Nicole Montineri
Invisible tears are the hardest to wipe away. Adabella Radici
Integrity without knowledge is weak and useless & knowledge without integrity is dangerous & dreadful. Samuel Johnson
Insist on yourself. Never imitate. Ralph Waldo Emerson
The enlightened give thanks for what most people take for granted. Michael Beckwith
I am always doing that which I cannot do, in order that I may learn how to do it. Pablo Picasso
Humility is not timid or weak.  Indeed, it is wisdom & grace combined with a mindfulness that we are all imperfect.
The danger of mediocrity is you kick around in it long enough and it starts to feel normal. Robin Sharma
We are what we think. All that we are arises with our thoughts. With our thoughts, we make the world. Buddha
True silence is the rest of the mind; it is to the spirit what sleep is to the body, nourishment & refreshment. William Penn
The dog is a gentleman; I hope to go to his heaven not man's. Mark Twain
We all cling to the past and because we cling to the past we become unavailable to the present. Osho
It is better to conquer yourself than to win a thousand battles. Buddha
The deepest principle of human nature is the craving to be appreciated. William James
Doing what you love is the cornerstone of having abundance in your life. Wayne Dyer
Don't find fault, find a remedy. Henry Ford
Although nobody can go back and make a new beginning, anyone can begin now and make a new ending. Chico Xavier

Alone we can do so little; together we can do so much. Helen Keller

U don't love someone because of their appearance. U love them because they sing a song only U can understand. Tiarah Ferguson

Failure is an event, never a person; an attitude, not an outcome. Zig Ziglar
A smile is a powerful weapon; you can even break ice with.

Effective leadership promotes growth; competent management provides stability.
Focus on the outcome and allow the Universe to use its infinite ways to make it happen. Rhonda Byrne
Imagination is a gift. Don't waste it! Jeanne Warnes
If you've ever felt inspired by a purpose or calling, you know the feeling of spirit working through you. Wayne Dyer

While you go looking for trinkets, the treasure house awaits you in your own being. Rumi

Everything in the universe is within you. Ask all from yourself. Rumi
We are seldom happy with what we now have but would go to pieces if we lost any part of it. Mignon McLaughlin
Don’t face reality... Create reality.
Your beliefs are your reality. If you don't like the reality you see, change your beliefs!
Your destiny is to move in the direction of your soul, but the fuel that makes destiny move is intention. Deepak Chopra
Your entire universe is in your mind & nowhere else. To expand the universe, expand your mind. Deepak Chopra
Your current safe boundaries were once frontiers.
Many deceive themselves, imagining they'll find happiness in change. Thomas A Kempis
Those who dance are considered insane by those who can't hear the music. George Carlin
The mind acts like an enemy for those who don't control it. Bagavad Gita
Your personal history doesn't determine your success in life. Your consciousness does. E Tolle
